front.title: Collection Tree Protocol for Lightweight On-demand Ad hoc Distance- vector Routing - Next Generation (LOADng-CT)

abstract.t: This document describes the Collection Tree Protocol for Lightweight Ad hoc On-Demand - Next Generation (LOADng-CT) to build routes between a designated root and all the other routers in Mobile Ad Hoc NETworks (MANETs). The protocol is an extension of LOADng.
